Content.Text:
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh-ho? Are you the new farmer everyone's been
talking about?
<PAGE>
I'm Witchie, the strongest witch of them all!
...That's my story, and I'm sticking to it.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Mrrrng... I'm sleepy. So very sleepy!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm not a morning person. Mornings are far too
bright and...heavy. They just make me want to
sit around and do nothing!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What are you up to at such an early hour?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm so bored today. Maybe I should cast a spell
on you. Don't worry, though! I'll concentrate real
hard and do it right!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I can't guarantee you it won't still fail horribly,
though. Hee hee hee! ♪

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello. Would you mind giving me something to
eat? I'm absolutely starving.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, what good timing! I'm bored, so this is the
perfect opportunity for you to tell me a story.
Go!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Behold! The night has finally come! Can you feel
the energy in the air? That's opportunity! So
much to do... Where to begin?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
My, you look really tired! But the night has only
just begun. Suck it up!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, now, what are you up to at this late hour?
Aren't people usually in bed by now?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's so bright outside. I don't like it...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today is lovely, isn't it? Rainy and humid... What
witch wouldn't love that?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If I go outside, I'll get sunburned. And sunburns
hurt!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today is lovely, isn't it? Rainy and humid... What
witch wouldn't love that?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's so bright outside. I don't like it...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today is lovely, isn't it? Rainy and humid... What
witch wouldn't love that?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's so bright out, but it's also cold! What an
interesting twist...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ahhhh... It's cold outside... So cold...and it's
snowing! Brrrrr...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's sure storming, huh? I-I'm a witch, though,
so this weather makes me feel g-great. Really!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's sure snowing a lot today. I wonder if my
house will get buried!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You've been seeing someone, haven't you?
<PAGE>
You can't fool me! Witches know everything.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think I'm pretty friendly, don't you? I mean, I
always take the time to chat with people when
they stop by...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This place is so quiet. I really love it. And the
moon reflecting on the pond's surface is
just...super pretty.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is my usual spot to practice flying, but I'm
always bumping into trees or falling into the
pond. I think I need to practice more!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hate going for walks because it always wears
me out. So you're probably wondering, why am I
walking? ...And that's a good question!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Witches are supposed to fly around on brooms.
But here I am using my own two legs like a
sucker! It's weird, don't you think?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, you. You live in my neighborhood, don't
you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>In that case, you should come visit me
whenever you have time! And bring me a
present!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm a witch, so I can use magic, of course.
Though I'm still in training.
<PAGE>
You wanna see some? Maybe I can transform
you into a frog or something...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...Hee hee hee, I'm just kidding! That's a bit too
advanced for me right now. You're off the hook!
Bet that's a relief, huh?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But once I become good enough, I'm totally
making a froggie out of you. No backing out
now! So just try to cooperate, okay?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Working on a farm seems hard. You should learn
some magic yourself.
<PAGE>
That way, you can finish watering your crops
and taking care of your animals with a snap of
the fingers!
<PAGE>
...Though that'd pretty much just make you a
lazy person, huh? Well...people need to work, so
good luck, I guess!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you have any friends?
<PAGE>
Witches are lone wolves. We don't depend on
anyone! ...Oh, but don't worry. I'm not lonely or
anything!
<PAGE>
Every night, frogs and snakes come to visit me,
and we just talk and talk. It's lovely!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I become a full-fledged witch, I plan to go
on a journey.
<PAGE>
I'll travel all over the world and see what's out
there waiting for me.
<PAGE>
And... And...I'll be the strongest witch there ever
was! For real!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I come from a long line of witches. When our
kind reaches a certain age, we have to leave our
houses to become full-fledged witches.
<PAGE>
And there's a lot of pressure, especially in my
case. See, my ancestors were pretty highly-
regarded, so I have a lot to live up to!
<PAGE>
But I really like this place, so I'm going to stay
here and keep at it. And in the meantime, you
should keep visiting me! Okay?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Witches don't usually get along with ordinary
humans.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But you're super-duper fun to talk to, so I've
decided to make an exception!
<PAGE>
Keep coming to see me from here on out, okay?
And don't forget to bring a present when you do!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Whoa! Is that what I think it is?!
<PAGE>
You brought me my most favoritest thing in the
world! That's so sweet of you! ♪

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah! How very thoughtful! You know what I like.
♪

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hmmm... Well, far be it from me to turn down a
gift. Thanks! ♪

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, is that for me? All right. I'll take it. Thanks.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You brought a gift for me, huh? ...I'll accept it,
then. You know, for social reasons.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I...don't recall ever asking for this, but since it's
a gift, I'll humbly accept it. Happy?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>... My most hated of all
things! Don't bring me one again, okay? I'll take
this one, though, since I'm a grown-up and all.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't really like flashy, gaudy things like
this...but since it's a gift, I can't very well turn it
down, now, can I?
Let's not give her a present right now.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...
<PAGE>
Don't you have something to say to me? Or are
you trying to buy my favor? Well, I don't want it,
so there! Hmph!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've already given me a gift today.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R><BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>! Huh? Oh, it's a
birthday present for me? Wow, that's very
thoughtful of you!
<PAGE>
I wish every day were my birthday, if it means
getting stuff like this. I loooooove it!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooh, this is for me, right?
<PAGE>
Oh, it's a birthday present? Wow... I don't know
what to say! I guess I'm...flattered! Thanks!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
For me, huh? Well, I'm not going to say no to a
birthday present. Thanks!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
For me...? Oh, for my birthday! Well, then,
I...accept, I guess!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...You brought me a gift? Oh, for my birthday!
<PAGE>
Well, I can't say no to that, I suppose...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I don't recall ever asking you for this, but if
you're giving it to me, I guess...oh, wait, is this
for my birthday?
<PAGE>
Well, then I have no choice, do I? Guess I'll take
it. Thanks for thinking of me.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...You want to give me my least favorite thing in
the world? Hrm, I guess I have to accept it,
though...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...What? It's my birthday present?! Wow. Uhh,
next time, maybe you should take a little more
time to pick something out...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't like this sort of flashy, gaudy thing,
but...well, it's a birthday gift, so I'll take it.
Thanks.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooh, looka the bunny! Okay, that clinches it. I'm
going to use my magic to transform you into a
plushie! ♪
<PAGE>
...What's that? I shouldn't?! Well, that's no fun!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh-ho, so you think you can match
transformation magics with me, do you? Hee
hee... Witches aren't so easily beaten, you know!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yay, an ermine! Okay, then, I'll use my magic to
transform you into a tin toy. If you only had a
brain! Hee hee... ♪
<PAGE>
...What's that? I shouldn't?! Well, that's no fun!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Maybe I should go frog with this one. Yes, frog
it is! I'm...relatively decided. Maybe.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What? Did you come here just to show me your
cute bunny rabbit?!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmmmm... Looks pretty fit. Might be a good
ingredient for my next elixir!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, you have a chicken, do you? No fair! I want
one, too! Chickens are great in elixirs. ♪

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Eep, a dog! I don't like dogs. Their barks are
scary! Keep it away from me...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What's with the ugly dog?!
<PAGE>
I don't like dogs. Their barks are scary! I-If you
come any closer, somebody's getting turned into
a frog, and it won't be me!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Eep, a dog! I don't like dogs. Their barks are
scary! Keep it away from me...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What's with the ugly dog?!
<PAGE>
I don't like dogs. Their barks are scary! I-If you
come any closer, somebody's getting turned into
a frog, and it won't be me!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, it's a cat! Cats are a witch's best friend and
minion, you know. Come here, kitty-cat! ♪
<PAGE>
SO CUTE. Offer it to me! You have to!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, it's a cat! Cats are a witch's best friend and
minion, you know. Come here, kitty-cat! ♪
<PAGE>
It's a bit on the pudgy side, but super-cute
anyway. Offer it to me! You have to!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, it's a cat! Cats are a witch's best friend and
minion, you know. Come here, kitty-cat! ♪
<PAGE>
SO CUTE. Offer it to me! You have to!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, it's a cat! Cats are a witch's best friend and
minion, you know. Come here, kitty-cat! ♪
<PAGE>
It's a bit on the pudgy side, but super-cute
anyway. Offer it to me! You have to!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh. I don't like flowers very much...but okay. I
guess this is the day when you humans give
flowers to each other, so...I accept.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a beautiful feather, but...I feel kinda like I
shouldn't accept it. Like, maybe it'd be some
bad mojo...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
In the world of witches, a ring serves as proof of
a contract. So...do you want to enter into a
contract with me?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, now, this is beautifully wrapped. I'm
excited to open it! I wonder what's inside...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...A present? Ooh, what is it, what is it?!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's your birthday, isn't it?
<PAGE>
Here you are. This is from me. So, like, it's a
present from a witch. And that's pretty special!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is...your birthday, right? Happy birthday.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, long time no see. You should drop by more
often. I won't cast any spells on you, I swear!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Fashionable work clothes, huh? That they're
black is the key here, because black is THE color
for us witches!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, you seem very...grown-up today.
More so than usual, for some reason.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That outfit looks a little too...I dunno,
contemporary on you? Modern? It's just...not
you, I'd say.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooh, <MYNAME>, that's really cool-looking on
you! Black outfits are the best.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Why in the heck are you dressing like an idol?!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Why in the heck are you dressing like an idol?!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I don't know why, but that outfit looks
very...familiar to me. I wanna add it to my
collection!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why are you wearing a weird outfit like that? Is
that what they wear in some foreign country or
something?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why are you wearing a weird outfit like that? Is
that what they wear in some foreign country or
something?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That outfit looks really warm. Like, maybe a little
too warm! But since it uses dark colors, I still
like it.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's a weird-looking outfit, but I love the dark
color scheme.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That outfit looks like it'd be really comfortable to
move around in. And it's dark-colored, so of
course I totally love it!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That vest is super stylish, and those dark colors
are really cool!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That outfit looks like it'd be really comfortable to
move around in. And it's dark-colored, so of
course I totally love it!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You look like an evil doctor. I don't like doctors
in their white coats, but this look is just...mmm,
super-duper! ♪

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
No way! Did you become a nun?! Nuns are like,
enemies to witches! So you'd best go back to
your farm right now!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...Hmm? Oh, you're not a nun? Okay, that's
good to hear. Just don't make a "habit" of
scaring me like that!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooh, I want a butler! Here, I have an idea. How
about you wear that uniform every day and wait
on me hand and foot? Sound good?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Why are you dressing just like me?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, I see. You want to be my protege, don't
you? Well, sorry, but I'm no one's master. Not
yet, anyway! Mwa ha ha...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...What's this? Did I turn someone into a panda?
I don't remember doing anything like that, but...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...Oh! It's just an animal costume!
<PAGE>
I was really confused there for a minute. I
thought maybe I was getting senile before my
time!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...What the...? Did I cast a spell on a suit of
armor in my sleep or something?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...Whoa! Didn't realize you were inside.
<PAGE>
I thought it was walking around by itself, and I
was trying to remember when I could've possibly
made that happen...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
My, what a stylish hat! The perfect hat to wear
when you're standing right next to me. It
complements me super-well!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooh, I like the color of your hat. It's the perfect
hat to wear when you're standing right next to
me. It complements me super-well!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ooh, I like the color of your hat. It's the perfect
hat to wear when you're standing right next to
me. It complements me super-well!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooh, I like the color of your hat. It's the perfect
hat to wear when you're standing right next to
me. It complements me super-well!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Black cats serve witches, you know. So as long
as you're wearing those ears, you have to serve
me! It's the way the world works!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, that's my hat! Give it back!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...What? It's yours?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>You look up to me so much that you wanted to
dress like me, is that it? That's ADORABLE! ♪

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoa, deja vu. I feel like I've seen that hat
somewhere before... Maybe it's just my
imagination, I dunno!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, look at the jewel embedded in that crown.
I can feel magic power emanating from it.
<PAGE>
Would you be so kind as to take it out and give
it to me? ...No?! Awww, come on!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>! Are you storing up mystic
powers in your eye or something?
<PAGE>
Hmm? You're not?! ...I-I knew that, of course!
You're just a plain old human, after all.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
...liese... bistalle... ra-laira... pipiro... enkidu...
zin... crshe... namtar...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nnnnnng, I'm so sleepy now... Why don't you go
home and get some sleep too? Let's both
just...*yawn*...get some...sleep...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Beep! We're sorry, Witchie is eating right now.
Please hold for the next available moment when
she can talk to you. La la la... *chomp*
